Summary Delivering top-notch service through high productivity and collaboration is my specialty and I thrive in a diverse and fast-paced environment. I specialize in pragmatic marketing as well as agile development processes. Throughout my career I have accrued a multitude of skills including client/partner relations, product marketing, sales enablement, and management. I have demonstrated a tremendous ability to support and maintain numerous business objectives. I work diligently to provide excellence in all my professional endeavors and have earned a reputation for my integrity, initiative, and results-driven work ethic - and have been called a luminary in software markets. In my most recent role, I led Big Data and Cloud Product Strategy & Marketing for Progress DataDirect. Before that, I was responsible for Business Process Management solutions both at Progress and IBM. Prior to Progress, I spent many years at IBM where I held a number of technical and management positions and was instrumental in leading and product managing IBM’s WebSphere – from its inception to an expanding and very successful portfolio of products. I moved into leading-edge technologies in Web services, followed by architecture and open source. From there, I transitioned into the mobile & wireless world, which became a natural progression into mobile communications. With a passion for WebSphere, I moved back into a leadership role in BPM and SOA products performing end-to-end market management -- including enablement, working across functional teams, focusing on communications, product marketing, content creation and briefings for customers, partners, analysts, prospects, and Sales. Throughout my career, I have conducted hundreds of press briefings, trade publication interviews, and technical workshops. I have given hundreds of technical presentations & keynotes to customers, partners, executive teams, and analysts – participating in dozens of trade shows and conferences around the world.
